price: Ó mulheres do Profeta! A quem de vós cometer obscenidade, duplicar-ser-lhe-á o castigo, em redobro. E isso, para Allah, é fácil.
arabic: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ مَن يَأۡتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفَٰحِشَةٖ مُّبَيِّنَةٖ يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهَا ٱلۡعَذَابُ ضِعۡفَيۡنِۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yānisāa al-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifāḥishatin mubayyinatin yuḍāʿaf lahā al-ʿadhābu ḍiʿ'fayni wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
